name: Restrofood Lite – Online Food Ordering System
author: ThemeLooks

sections.description:
Restrofood Lite is an online food ordering and delivery system plugin for WordPress. You can manage your restaurant & other food ordering stuff with Restrofood. It has plenty of amazing features. That helps you to build a successful online business.

Main Features of Restrofood Lite:

  • Easy WooCommerce Food Order System
  • Ajax Quick Product View
  • Ajax Quick search
  • Single Page Checkout System
  • Ajax Category Filter
  • Ajax Pagination
  • Delivery type select option ( Delivery/pickup )
  • Delivery/pickup time select option
  • Easy settings options
  • Compatibility with wordpress 6+
  • Translation ready
  • Ready for translation ( .pot files included )
  • Free Updates
  • Error free code
  • Well Documented
sections.installation:
The easy way.

Go to your WordPress Dashboard. Navigate to Plugins > Add New and then search for “Restrofood Lite”. Click on Install and then Activate the Plugin.

That’s it, Restrofood Lite Plugin is now activated on your site!

The hard way..

Download “Restrofood Lite WordPress Plugin” and then extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatable on latest WordPress ?

Yes
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

Resolved compatibility issues with WordPress 6.6.2.
Removed unnecessary automatic page creation.

1.0.2

Fixed compatibility issue

1.0.0

This is initial Release for Restrofood Lite
